channel.title: game crash after few seconds
channel.description: I am getting "hl.exe has stopped..." error after a set period of time upon launching the game, no matter what I do during those few seconds. I can start a new game, browse the menu or simply do nothing but after about 15 secs the game will crash. Like some kind of time bomb. :'( Please help someone! I REEALLY wanna play this.... I've attached the last crash dump. Steam_2013_11_18__15_02_46_399.zip (40.5 KB)

item.title: game crash after few seconds
item.dc:creator: avi1708
item.description:
I am getting “hl.exe has stopped…” error after a set period of time upon launching the game, no matter what I do during those few seconds. I can start a new game, browse the menu or simply do nothing but after about 15 secs the game will crash. Like some kind of time bomb. :’( Please help someone! I REEALLY wanna play this…

I’ve attached the last crash dump.
Steam_2013_11_18__15_02_46_399.zip (40.5 KB)
